unnormalised: Under Sec. 304A of the IPC, causing death by negligence carries a maximum punishment of 2 yrs jail or a fine, or both; Adv. Sharma can explain the nuances further.
normalised: Under Section three hundred and four A of the I-P-C, causing death by negligence carries a maximum punishment of two years jail or a fine, or both; Advocate Sharma can explain the nuances further.
